body.name: Nesugar Steamer for Clothes Steamer, Fashion Portable Handheld Garment Steamer, 0.8lbs Lightly, 15s Fast Heat-up, 10 Minutes of Continuous Steam, Light Mini Steam Iron for travel and home

features: UNIQUE DESIGN: Nesugar Steamer for Clothes has a one of a kind luxury-looking design. Mainbody is as light as only 0.8lbs, almost the weight of two Smart phones, long lasting for over 10 minutes of continuous steaming to emit wrinkle perfectly by using less steam, keeping clothes as dry as possible in the meantime.

EASE TO USE: 900W Steamer produces soft and long-lasting dry steam. preparation for steaming in just 15 seconds, with only one button to control for steaming. 6ft Power Cord, easy for operating steamer conveniently. Equipped with wall mount bracket and A travel storage bag, it can be a portable travel steamer or a handyhome steamer.

STEAMING IN ANY ORIENTATION: As a portable steamer, it is designed to use in all angles. Dual-use is designed with a hanging iron and a flat iron for home and travel uses. Rotating head is designed for various operation positions.
NO WATER SPOT LEFT BEHIND: Nesugar Hand-Held Steamer from any angle without any water left behind! For all kind of garments, all coats, wool, delicates, and more.
WHAT YOU GET: 1* garment steamer, 1* flannel storage bag, 1* wall mount bracket, 1* double-sided adhesive, 1* user manual, our worry-free 365 days warranty, and friendly customer service

about us Nesugar is an original design brand, industrial design as the driving force of innovation, to create innovative life aesthetic products. Interesting, innovation, simplicity as the brand design concept; interesting: change the coldness of the previous products, increase the fun; innovation: different design, give users a new experience; simplicity: without excessive decoration, back to the essence of design. The young and energetic design team is committed to exploring products with new experience methods and giving users a new experience; we may make mistakes in the process of innovation, but we will continue to try, until the product experience exceeds user expectations, our innovation will never stop. Our mission is to design products that provide users with a new experience that exceeds expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy to use and effective.
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the design is very clean and nice.It is convenient to carry, so I take it with me when I go on business trips.It's great for simply smoothing out wrinkles in a shirt.I use it well at home too. Although it uses less water, it is actually better. If you store a lot of water, the water may change.The design is so neat that it doesn't bother you even if you leave it outside.There were times when I forgot to leave the power connected for a long time, but there was no risk of fire at all and it was stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel but also perfect at home
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a Christmas gift for our son who lives in Europe and travels extensively. Very compact as advertised, stylish and well-built. The water reservoir holds enough for a thorough de-wrinkling of one garment, maybe a quick touchup on a couple of items. Water heats up super-fast and the results were positive enough that we're buying a second one for use here at home. If there was any negative, the wall bracket means you have to use one of those sticky pads for installation. Seems like a better idea would be a cradle you took take along traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and Portable Garment Steamer
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Nesugar Steamer for Clothes, and overall, I am quite satisfied with its performance. This handheld garment steamer has proven to be a reliable companion in keeping my clothes wrinkle-free, especially when I'm on the go.Its ease of use and versatility make it a handy tool for home and travel. While there are minor drawbacks, they are outweighed by its overall performance. I recommend this garment steamer to those looking for a convenient and efficient solution for wrinkle removal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and Works Instantly
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is so useful and easy to use. The size is perfect for slipping into my tote or a medium size purse. All you need to do is pour a little water and press the button for the steamer to start working its magic. The best thing about this product is that the hot steam starts working instantly and it’s extremely useful for on the go touch ups and quick fixes. For the size, the steamer is pretty powerful and comes with a pouch and stand. The cord also has a strap to keep you from tripping on the wire.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for the RV - work great
reviews.reviewText: I had given up my iron because we are full time RV. However, that didn't always work well for me as I would have to plan ahead, and try to hang something in the bathroom after my shower to get it to relax.This is great. It's small, light weight and works. I've used it a bunch since I bought it. Because it's so easy to use, take less than a minute to heat up. Then I just rest it on the kitchen counter until it cools down before putting it back in its travel bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect, Sleek, and Great for Traveling
reviews.reviewText: Oddly enough, it has been a struggle to find steamers as most leak or are too bulky. However, this steamer was not only easy to use, but is also so sleek and ideal for traveling. The design of this product is so perfect and it's functional! Couldn't recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect portable steamer
reviews.reviewText: First of all, I absolutely love the color. I got the green one and it is so pretty. This little steamer is amazing, it is very easy to use and comes with a nice bag you can put it in for travel and also comes with a bracket so you can hang it up for easy storage. The bracket also has hooks for hangers so you can hang your garment from the bracket and steam it right there. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and easy!
reviews.reviewText: It’s very nice design and compact size which is great for traveling. I already have one regular steamer and I was looking for something small that I can take it with me. I check multiple compact steamer but this one was the smallest. The quality is good and light weight. It is easy to use and definitely good for travel. It is working well and you can get rid of wrinkles fast. The only think that I wished it had was the iron plate which I saw on some other models. I think that also be a plus for this little handy steamer. It’s easy to fill the water and cleaning. Not sure about the quality of the product to see how long it will work because I bought it recently but so far so good! I will update if I noticed something else!

I bought this product because it’s small and easy to put in my carry on as I travel very often. It’s still wild to me that I paid $123 for this product and it didn’t have a US plug. Did they expect me to buy an adaptor? Returned straight awayAlso it spits out water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This does not work in the UK as its the wrong voltage and wrong plug - DO NOT BUY

The media could not be loaded. I used this once it worked fine. The second time I turned it on, it leaked water and didn’t steam. Clearly a faulty product. Would not recommend. It’s also quite heavy for travel.
